name: 蕭俊祥
objective:
先修課程:負責教授同意.
類神經網路介紹: 演算法,應用,與程式技巧，類神經網路控制器設計與模擬，模糊集合,近似推理理論,模糊邏輯控制器介紹，模糊邏輯控制器設計與模擬，基因演算法介紹，以基因演算法最佳化控制器，智慧型控制應用。
schedule:
1.Genetic Algorithm (GA)
2.Fuzzy Logic Controller (FLC)
3. Neural Network (NN)
4. Fuzzy Neural Network (FNN)
5.Application of intelligent controller
scorePolicy:
1.Test (60%) : Midterm and Final Exams
 ●Written tests, Computer Simulations

2. Homework (40%): Matlab/Simulink, C
materials:
1. Genetic algorithms in search, optimization and machine
     learning 
     David E. Goldberg, 1989, Addison Wesley.
2. Neural Fuzzy Systems 
    C.T. Lin (交大) and C.S. George Lee (Purdue University)
3. Handouts, class notes, papers.
